pages.text: On a quiet morning in early autumn, a small leaf hung gently from a tall oak tree.
The wind whispered softly through the branches, telling stories of faraway places the leaf had never seen.
One day, the wind carried the little leaf into the sky. It danced above rooftops, across fields, and over rivers.
The leaf landed in a garden, where a curious child picked it up and smiled. 'What a beautiful leaf,' they said.
That night, the child placed the leaf inside a book and kept it as a memory of the gentle wind and the story it carried.
